title: Number Checker
subtitle: Check if a number is prime, even, or odd
description: A powerful extension that helps you check various properties of numbers. Features include prime number checking, even/odd detection, and more mathematical utilities.

documentation.title: Getting Started
documentation.content: To use the Number Checker extension, simply drag and drop the component into your app and use the provided blocks.

documentation.title: Available Blocks
documentation.content:
1. IsPrime(number) - Returns true if the number is prime
2. IsEven(number) - Returns true if the number is even
3. IsOdd(number) - Returns true if the number is odd

documentation.title: Example Usage
documentation.content:
Here's a simple example of how to use the Number Checker:

1. Add the Number Checker component to your app
2. Use the blocks in your logic to check number properties
3. Display the results to the user

title: Islamic History
subtitle: Hijri date for Muslims and Islamic history utilities
description: A comprehensive extension for Islamic applications. Features include Hijri date conversion, prayer times, and Islamic history events.

documentation.title: Features
documentation.content:
- Hijri date conversion
- Prayer times calculation
- Islamic history events
- Qibla direction

documentation.title: Usage
documentation.content:
1. Add the Islamic History component to your app
2. Configure your location settings
3. Use the provided blocks to access Islamic features

title: Device Info
subtitle: Retrieve essential information about the device
description: Get detailed information about the user's device including hardware specifications, software version, and system status.

documentation.title: Available Information
documentation.content:
- Device model and manufacturer
- Android version
- Screen resolution
- Battery status
- Memory usage

title: Slide Color Picker
subtitle: Create a custom slider bar for color selection
description: A beautiful and intuitive color picker with sliding controls. Perfect for apps that need color customization features.

documentation.title: Features
documentation.content:
- RGB and HSV color modes
- Customizable slider appearance
- Color preview
- Color value export

title: Painter
subtitle: Create custom drawings with awesome functions
description: A powerful drawing extension with various tools and effects. Perfect for creating art apps or adding drawing features to your application.

documentation.title: Tools
documentation.content:
- Brush with customizable size and color
- Eraser
- Shapes (circle, rectangle, line)
- Text tool
- Fill tool

title: Painter Pro
subtitle: Advanced features for custom drawings with even more functionality
description: The professional version of Painter with advanced features for serious artists and developers.

documentation.title: Advanced Features
documentation.content:
- Layer support
- Advanced brush engine
- Custom filters and effects
- Export to multiple formats

title: Image Compressor
subtitle: Compress images efficiently
description: Optimize your app's storage and performance with efficient image compression.

documentation.title: Compression Options
documentation.content:
- Quality adjustment
- Size reduction
- Format conversion
- Batch processing

title: Video Compressor
subtitle: Compress video files with ease
description: Reduce video file sizes while maintaining quality. Perfect for apps that handle video uploads.

documentation.title: Features
documentation.content:
- Resolution adjustment
- Bitrate control
- Format conversion
- Progress tracking

title: Photo Filter Pro
subtitle: Filter your images with custom filters
description: Add professional photo filters and effects to your app with this powerful extension.

documentation.title: Filter Types
documentation.content:

- Vintage effects

title: HTXML
subtitle: Advanced HTML/XML functionalities
description: Handle HTML and XML data with ease in your App Inventor projects.

documentation.title: Features
documentation.content:
- HTML parsing
- XML processing
- Web scraping
- Data extraction

title: Music Bar
subtitle: Create custom music bars
description: Create beautiful and customizable music bars for your app. Perfect for music players, audio visualizers, and more.

documentation.title: Features
documentation.content:
- Customizable bar colors
- Adjustable bar width and spacing
- Smooth animations

title: SMS Pro
subtitle: Advanced SMS features
description: Enhanced SMS capabilities for your app including scheduled messages and group sending.

documentation.title: Advanced Features
documentation.content:

title: YouTube Downloader
subtitle: Download videos from YouTube with ease
description: Download YouTube videos directly to your app with various quality options.

documentation.title: Features
documentation.content:
